metadata.titleEn: Global marine isoprene emission data set (2001-2020)
metadata.titleCn: 全球海洋异戊二烯排放数据集（2001-2020）
metadata.description: This dataset provides information on global hourly marine isoprene emission flux for the period 2001-2020. The dataset used MODIS marine chlorophyll concentration data, diffuse attenuation coefficients, VIIRS water-leaving radiation data and ERA5 reanalysis meteorological data as input. Hourly emission fluxes of isoprene from two marine sources were calculated, including marine biological emissions and photochemical emissions in the sea microsurface, using the latest physical, biological and chemical processes and empirical relationships derived from recent obervations and laboratory studies. Data for Netcdf format file, containing biological emissions' flux_bio and photochemical emissions' flux_sml 'two variables as well as latitude and longitude information, with temporal resolution for hours. The dataset provides two spatial and temporal resolutions, including daily 1 degree grid and hourly 0.25 degree grid . The reliability of this dataset is verified by comparing the results of marine isoprene concentrations and emission fluxes from this dataset with those from previous observations. Isoprene, as an important biological volatile organic compound (BVOC), is a major source of secondary organic aerosols (SOA) from natural sources in terrestrial and marine area. This dataset can be used as an input data for earth system model simulation in formation of marine SOA. This work in order to further study the effect of air-sea system for Marine SOA formation and its climate effect laid a solid foundation.
metadata.descriptionCn: 本数据集提供了2001-2020的全球海洋异戊二烯逐小时排放通量信息。该数据集以MODIS海洋叶绿素浓度，漫反射衰减系数，VIIRS离水辐射数据和ERA5再分析气象数据作为输入，基于最新的物理、化学和生物过程以及已有观测实验得出的经验关系，计算了包含海洋浮游生物排放和海洋微表层中光化学排放的两类海洋源异戊二烯逐小时排放通量。本数据集为netcdf格式文件，包含生物排放‘flux_bio’和光化学排放'flux_sml'两个变量以及经纬度信息。本数据集提供了两种时空分辨率，包括逐日1deg*1deg经纬度格点和逐小时0.25deg*0.25deg经纬度格点，覆盖全球范围。本数据集通过与过往走航观测研究中的海洋异戊二烯浓度和排放通量结果进行对比，验证了可靠性。异戊二烯作为重要的生物性挥发性有机化合物（BVOC），是陆地和远洋地区自然源二次有机气溶胶（SOA）产生的主要来源。本套数据集可作为地球系统模式模拟海洋SOA生成过程的输入。这项工作为进一步研究海气系统对海洋SOA形成的影响及其气候效应奠定了基础。关于数据集的引用方法与详细描述请阅读说明文档。
metadata.instructions: File name: Marine isoprene emission data stored in NetCDF format, each netcdf file contains biological emissions(flux_bio) and sea microlayer emission (flux_sml) and the corresponding longitude and latitude variables. File name is yyyy_mm. nc, including yyyy on behalf of the year, the mm on behalf of the corresponding month. Such as 2001_01.nc represents the January 2001 global marine isoprene hourly emission data. Also, the data with daily 1-degree grids is named yyyy_ Daily1deg.nc.
metadata.instructionsCn: 文件命名：海洋异戊二烯排放数据以NetCDF格式储存，每个NetCDF文件包含生物排放(flux_bio)和海洋微表层排放(sml_flux)两个变量以及对应的经度变量和纬度变量。文件名称为yyyy_mm.nc，其中yyyy代表年份，mm代表对应月份。如2001_01.nc代表了2001年一月的全球海洋逐小时异戊二烯排放数据。另有逐日1度格点的数据命名为yyyy_daily1deg.nc。

background: Biogenic organic volatile compounds (BVOCs), one of the most important components in the marine boundary layer (MBL), play an important role in the formation of marine secondary organic aerosols (SOAs), particularly in pristine remote oceans. Among all the non-methane BVOC species, isoprene exhibits large emissions and demonstrates significant atmospheric chemical reactivity in the marine environment. Within the MBL, isoprene can undergo oxidation, leading to the formation of semi-volatile organic compounds (SVOCs) and low-volatility organic compounds (LVOCs) such as methacrolein and methacrylic acid. Due to its significant emissions and capacity to contribute to SOA formation, marine isoprene plays a crucial role in aerosol generation and growth within the MBL. Previous studies have estimated marine isoprene emissions using both bottom–up and top–down approaches. The estimation of BIO emissions is typically derived from an empirical linear relationship established between ocean chlorophyll concentration and isoprene emissions. The estimation of SML emissions is based on the surfactants present in the SML and their associated photochemical processes. Previous estimates also encountered challenges related to data availability and unclear emission mechanisms, leading to uncertainties in the estimated emissions. Estimations for high latitudes are particularly lacking due to limited satellite data coverage during the winter months. Moreover, previous estimations of vertical distributions of chlorophyll and isoprene concentrations did not entirely align with current observed vertical profiles in the subsurface ocean.
research objective: Here we built a module to present a 20-year (2001–2020) global hourly dataset for marine isoprene emissions, including phytoplankton-generated biological emissions (BIO emissions) and photochemistry-generated emissions in the sea surface microlayer (SML emissions) based on the latest advancements in biological, physical, and chemical processes, with high spatial resolutions. This work provides the foundation for further studies into the impact of the air–sea system on marine SOA formation and its climate effect. Our dataset can be used as input data for climate or atmospheric chemistry models. The module can also be coupled with the earth system model to calculate marine isoprene emissions online.
challenges: Previous estimates also encountered challenges related to data availability and unclear emission mechanisms, leading to uncertainties in the estimated emissions. Estimations for high latitudes are particularly lacking due to limited satellite data coverage during the winter months. Moreover, previous estimations of vertical distributions of chlorophyll and isoprene concentrations did not entirely align with current observed vertical profiles in the subsurface ocean. The relationships between emissions and marine and meteorological factors, established on the basis of localized phytoplankton populations, are regionally constrained and may not be applicable in all situations. These limitations led to discrepancies between observed emissions and the estimations obtained using previous methods.
methods: We obtained 20-year (2001–2020) monthly average chlorophyll concentration data at 9 km resolution and 490 nm downwelling radiative flux diffuse attenuation coefficient data with the same spatial resolution from the MODIS Level 3 product in the National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA) Ocean Color Web (NASA, 2022a, b). These two datasets were averaged into grids with a resolution of 0.25°×0.25° to fit the fifth-generation European Centre for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts (ECMWF) atmospheric reanalysis (ERA5) dataset used in this study. Additionally, the monthly normalized water-leaving radiance at 410 nm for the period 2012–2020 from the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA CoastWatch, 2017) was utilized to determine the distribution of phytoplankton types together with chlorophyll concentration. The phytoplankton-generated emission module was developed based on the assumption that the concentration of isoprene in the ocean remains static in each hour. The isoprene production rate, P, was determined by a linear relationship between chlorophyll concentration, radiation, and the diffuse attenuation coefficient at 490 nm, as well as the classification of phytoplankton types. The aforementioned equations were utilized to estimate the hourly marine isoprene emissions originating from phytoplankton within each grid, with a spatial resolution of 0.25°×0.25°. The dominant phytoplankton type was determined using monthly satellite-observed normalized water-leaving radiance at 410 nm and seawater chlorophyll concentration. An interpolation for hourly isoprene BIO and SML emissions is applied during the boreal summer (June, July, and August) and winter months (December, November, and January) in this study.
dataset: Here we built a module to present a 20-year (2001–2020) global hourly dataset for marine isoprene emissions, including phytoplankton-generated biological emissions (BIO emissions) and photochemistry-generated emissions in the sea surface microlayer (SML emissions) based on the latest advancements in biological, physical, and chemical processes, with high spatial resolutions. Our dataset suggests the annual global marine isoprene emissions amount to 1.097 ±0.009 Tg yr−1. Among these, the BIO emissions are 0.481±0.008 Tg yr−1 while SML emissions contribute 0.616±0.003 Tg yr−1. Here, we generated a 0.25◦×0.25◦grid dataset of global marine isoprene emissions covering a 20-year period from 2001 to 2020 with an updated method combining the latest emission features and state-of-the-art influencing factors. Two distinct types of emissions, BIO emissions and SML emissions, were calculated by satellite-derived monthly ocean chlorophyll concentration data from the MODIS and ERA5 hourly meteorological reanalysis separately.
findings: Our dataset suggests the annual global marine isoprene emissions amount to 1.097 ±0.009 Tg yr−1. The annual total isoprene emissions across the tropical ocean show a declining trend from 2001 to 2020. Most ocean regions exhibit a 1-year emission period, whereas a significant intraseasonal period is found in the tropical ocean.
backgroundCn: 生物源有机挥发性化合物（BVOCs）是海洋边界层（MBL）中最重要的成分之一，在海洋次生有机气溶胶（SOAs）的形成中发挥着重要作用，尤其是在原始的远洋地区。在所有非甲烷BVOC物种中，异丁烯的排放量大，并且在海洋环境中表现出显著的大气化学反应性。在MBL中，异丁烯可以经历氧化，导致半挥发性有机化合物（SVOCs）和低挥发性有机化合物（LVOCs）的形成，如甲烯醛和甲基丙烯酸。由于其显著的排放量和对SOA形成的贡献，海洋异丁烯在MBL中的气溶胶生成和增长中发挥着关键作用。之前的研究使用自下而上和自上而下的方法估算了海洋异丁烯的排放。BIO排放的估算通常基于海洋叶绿素浓度与异丁烯排放之间建立的经验线性关系。SML排放的估算则基于SML中存在的表面活性剂及其相关的光化学过程。之前的估算还面临数据可用性和不明确的排放机制等挑战，导致估算的排放存在不确定性。由于冬季卫星数据覆盖有限，高纬度地区的估算尤其缺乏。此外，之前对叶绿素和异丁烯浓度的垂直分布估算与当前观察到的亚表层海洋垂直剖面并不完全一致。
research objectiveCn: 我们建立了一个模块，呈现2001年至2020年全球每小时的海洋异戊烯排放数据集，包括由浮游植物产生的生物排放（BIO排放）和海表微层（SML排放）中的光化学生成排放，基于最新的生物、物理和化学过程，具有高空间分辨率。这项工作为进一步研究空气-海洋系统对海洋二次有机气溶胶（SOA）形成及其气候影响提供了基础。我们的数据集可以作为气候或大气化学模型的输入数据。该模块还可以与地球系统模型耦合，以在线计算海洋异戊烯排放。
challengesCn: 之前的估计也面临与数据可用性和不明确的排放机制相关的挑战，导致排放估计存在不确定性。由于冬季卫星数据覆盖有限，高纬度地区的估计尤其缺乏。此外，之前对叶绿素和异戊二烯浓度的垂直分布的估计与当前在海洋表层观察到的垂直剖面并不完全一致。基于局部浮游植物种群建立的排放与海洋和气象因素之间的关系是区域性限制的，可能并不适用于所有情况。这些限制导致观察到的排放与使用之前方法获得的估计之间存在差异。
methodsCn: 我们获得了2001年至2020年为期20年的月平均叶绿素浓度数据，分辨率为9公里，以及相同空间分辨率下的490纳米下行辐射通量的扩散衰减系数数据，这些数据来自美国国家航空航天局（NASA）海洋颜色网络的MODIS Level 3产品（NASA，2022a，b）。这两个数据集被平均成0.25°×0.25°的网格，以适应本研究中使用的第五代欧洲中期天气预报中心（ECMWF）大气重分析（ERA5）数据集。此外，利用2012年至2020年期间的国家海洋和大气管理局（NOAA CoastWatch，2017）提供的410纳米的月度归一化水离开辐射，结合叶绿素浓度来确定浮游植物类型的分布。基于海洋中异戊二烯浓度在每小时保持静态的假设，开发了浮游植物产生的排放模块。异戊二烯的生产率P是通过叶绿素浓度、辐射和490纳米的扩散衰减系数之间的线性关系，以及浮游植物类型的分类来确定的。上述方程用于估算每个网格中源自浮游植物的每小时海洋异戊二烯排放，空间分辨率为0.25°×0.25°。主导的浮游植物类型是通过每月卫星观测的410纳米归一化水离开辐射和海水叶绿素浓度来确定的。在本研究中，对夏季（6月、7月和8月）和冬季（12月、11月和1月）的每小时异戊二烯生物排放和表面微层（SML）排放进行了插值处理。
datasetCn: 我们构建了一个模块，以展示2001年至2020年全球海洋异戊烯排放的20年（每小时）数据集，包括由浮游植物产生的生物排放（BIO排放）和海表微层（SML排放）中的光化学生成排放，基于最新的生物、物理和化学过程，具有高空间分辨率。我们的数据集表明，全球年海洋异戊烯排放量为1.097 ±0.009 Tg yr−1。其中，BIO排放为0.481±0.008 Tg yr−1，而SML排放贡献0.616±0.003 Tg yr−1。在此，我们生成了一个覆盖2001年至2020年20年期间的全球海洋异戊烯排放的0.25◦×0.25◦网格数据集，采用了结合最新排放特征和最先进影响因素的更新方法。两种不同类型的排放，BIO排放和SML排放，分别通过来自MODIS的卫星衍生的每月海洋叶绿素浓度数据和ERA5每小时气象重分析数据进行计算。
findingsCn: 我们的数据集表明，全球海洋异丁烯排放量年均为1.097 ±0.009 Tg yr−1。2001年至2020年间，热带海洋的年总异丁烯排放量呈下降趋势。大多数海洋区域表现出1年的排放周期，而热带海洋则发现了显著的季内周期。

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method used to estimate marine isoprene emissions?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个用于估计海洋异丁烯排放的数据收集方法的例子？
Example.AnswerEn: A data collection method used to estimate marine isoprene emissions involves obtaining monthly average chlorophyll concentration data and downwelling radiative flux diffuse attenuation coefficient data from the MODIS Level 3 product, which are averaged into grids to align with the ECMWF ERA5 dataset.
Example.AnswerCn: 一种用于估算海洋异丁烯排放的数据收集方法涉及从MODIS Level 3产品中获取每月平均的叶绿素浓度数据和下行辐射通量的散射衰减系数数据，并将其平均成网格，以与ECMWF ERA5数据集对齐。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a challenge encountered in estimating marine isoprene emissions?
Example.QuestionCn: 估算海洋异戊二烯排放时遇到的一个挑战是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a challenge encountered in estimating marine isoprene emissions is the limited satellite data coverage during winter months, especially at high latitudes, which leads to uncertainties in the estimated emissions.
Example.AnswerCn: 估算海洋异戊烯排放时遇到的一个挑战是冬季月份，尤其是在高纬度地区，卫星数据覆盖有限，这导致排放估算的不确定性。

Example.QuestionEn: Can you give an example of a dataset that provides information on marine isoprene emissions over a lengthy period?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个数据集的例子，该数据集提供了长时间内海洋异戊烯排放的信息？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a dataset that provides information on marine isoprene emissions over a lengthy period is the 20-year global hourly dataset for marine isoprene emissions from 2001 to 2020, which includes both phytoplankton-generated biological emissions and photochemistry-generated emissions in the sea surface microlayer.
Example.AnswerCn: 一个提供海洋异戊烯排放信息的长期数据集的例子是2001年至2020年的20年全球每小时海洋异戊烯排放数据集，其中包括浮游植物产生的生物排放和海表微层中的光化学排放。

Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 叶绿素浓度、下行辐射通量漫射衰减系数、浮游植物类型、气象条件

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What challenges are associated with the data availability and emission mechanism clarity in estimating marine isoprene emissions?

Feature Specification.AnswerEn: limited satellite data coverage in high latitudes during winter months, discrepancies in vertical profiles of chlorophyll and isoprene concentrations, uncertainties in estimating emissions, regionally constrained relationships between emissions and marine and meteorological factors
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 在冬季高纬度地区，卫星数据覆盖有限，叶绿素和异戊二烯浓度的垂直剖面存在差异，排放估算存在不确定性，排放与海洋和气象因素之间的关系具有区域限制。

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many types of emissions are quantified in a dataset focusing on marine isoprene emissions?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在一个关注海洋异戊烯排放的数据集中，量化了多少种排放类型？

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the spatial resolution used in a dataset for estimating hourly marine isoprene emissions?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 用于估计每小时海洋异戊烯排放的数据集的空间分辨率是多少？

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'phytoplankton-generated biological emissions (BIO emissions)' mean in the context of marine isoprene emissions?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在海洋异戊烯排放的背景下，“植物浮游生物产生的生物排放（BIO排放）”指的是由植物浮游生物释放的气体或化合物，这些物质可能对大气化学和气候变化产生影响。
Definition.AnswerEn: Phytoplankton-generated biological emissions (BIO emissions) refer to the production of isoprene by phytoplankton within the marine environment. This process is driven by a linear relationship between chlorophyll concentration, radiation, and the diffuse attenuation coefficient at 490 nm, as well as the classification of phytoplankton types. It represents the biological component of marine isoprene emissions, distinct from photochemistry-generated emissions in the sea surface microlayer.
Definition.AnswerCn: 植物 plankton 产生的生物排放（BIO 排放）是指在海洋环境中，植物 plankton 产生异戊二烯的过程。该过程受到叶绿素浓度、辐射和490 nm波长的扩散衰减系数之间线性关系的驱动，以及植物 plankton 类型的分类。它代表了海洋异戊二烯排放的生物成分，区别于海表微层中的光化学生成排放。

Definition.QuestionEn: What is meant by 'photochemistry-generated emissions in the sea surface microlayer (SML emissions)' in marine isoprene studies?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在海洋异戊烯研究中，“光化学生成的海面微层（SML排放）”是指在海洋表面微层中通过光化学反应产生的排放物。
Definition.AnswerEn: Photochemistry-generated emissions in the sea surface microlayer (SML emissions) refer to the production of isoprene through photochemical processes occurring at the ocean's surface microlayer. These emissions are driven by surfactants present in the SML and their associated photochemical activities, providing a distinct source of isoprene emissions separate from those generated by phytoplankton.
Definition.AnswerCn: 光化学生成的海面微层（SML）排放指的是在海洋表面微层中通过光化学过程产生异戊二烯的现象。这些排放是由存在于SML中的表面活性剂及其相关的光化学活动驱动的，提供了一种与浮游植物产生的异戊二烯排放不同的独特来源。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do the methods used for estimating phytoplankton-generated biological emissions (BIO emissions) compare to those used for photochemistry-generated emissions in the sea surface microlayer (SML emissions)?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 估计浮游植物产生的生物排放（BIO排放）的方法与用于海表微层（SML排放）中光化学产生的排放的方法相比如何？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The estimation of BIO emissions is derived from a linear relationship between ocean chlorophyll concentration, radiation, and the diffuse attenuation coefficient, while SML emissions are estimated based on the surfactants present in the sea surface microlayer and their associated photochemical processes.
Comparison.AnswerCn: BIO排放的估算是基于海洋叶绿素浓度、辐射和扩散衰减系数之间的线性关系，而SML排放则是基于海表微层中存在的表面活性剂及其相关的光化学过程进行估算的。

Comparison.QuestionEn: In what ways do challenges related to data availability and unclear emission mechanisms differ between BIO and SML emission estimations?
Comparison.QuestionCn: BIO和SML排放估算中与数据可用性和不明确的排放机制相关的挑战有哪些不同之处？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Challenges for both BIO and SML emissions include data availability and unclear emission mechanisms, but the estimation of BIO emissions specifically struggles with aligning vertical distributions of chlorophyll and isoprene concentrations with observed profiles, while SML emissions face difficulties due to limited satellite data coverage, especially in high latitude regions during winter months.
Comparison.AnswerCn: BIO和SML排放面临的挑战包括数据可用性和排放机制不明确，但BIO排放的估算特别难以将叶绿素和异戊二烯浓度的垂直分布与观测到的剖面对齐，而SML排放则由于卫星数据覆盖有限，尤其是在冬季的高纬度地区，面临困难。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How does the spatial resolution of datasets used in estimating marine isoprene emissions impact the accuracy of BIO and SML emissions estimation?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 用于估算海洋异戊烯排放的数据库的空间分辨率如何影响生物源（BIO）和海洋表层（SML）排放估算的准确性？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The spatial resolution, such as the 0.25°×0.25° grid used for the dataset, allows for high-resolution estimation of both BIO and SML emissions, potentially enhancing accuracy by incorporating detailed spatial variability in chlorophyll concentration and meteorological factors. However, the regional constraints of phytoplankton populations and meteorological factors might still lead to discrepancies.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 空间分辨率，例如用于该数据集的0.25°×0.25°网格，允许对BIO和SML排放进行高分辨率估计，可能通过纳入叶绿素浓度和气象因素的详细空间变异性来提高准确性。然而，浮游植物种群和气象因素的区域限制仍可能导致差异。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What underlying patterns can be inferred from the 20-year trend of marine isoprene emissions, and how might these patterns impact the modeling of secondary organic aerosols in marine environments?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 可以推断出海洋异戊二烯排放的20年趋势中潜在的模式，这些模式可能会影响海洋环境中二次有机气溶胶的建模。
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The 20-year trend of marine isoprene emissions shows a declining trend in annual total emissions across the tropical ocean from 2001 to 2020. This pattern might impact the modeling of secondary organic aerosols by suggesting a potential decrease in isoprene's contribution to aerosol formation over time, which could influence the understanding of aerosol generation and growth within the marine boundary layer.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 20年来，海洋异戊二烯排放的趋势显示，从2001年到2020年，热带海洋的年总排放量呈下降趋势。这一模式可能会影响二次有机气溶胶的建模，暗示异戊二烯对气溶胶形成的贡献可能随时间减少，这可能影响对海洋边界层内气溶胶生成和增长的理解。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How might the integration of satellite-derived chlorophyll concentration data and meteorological reanalysis data inform the accuracy and reliability of estimating marine isoprene emissions?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 卫星衍生的叶绿素浓度数据与气象重分析数据的结合如何提高海洋异丁烯排放估算的准确性和可靠性？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The integration of satellite-derived chlorophyll concentration data and meteorological reanalysis data enhances the accuracy and reliability of estimating marine isoprene emissions by providing high spatial and temporal resolution inputs, allowing for detailed calculations of biological and photochemical emissions in the marine environment. This approach addresses challenges such as data availability and emission mechanism uncertainties, offering a more comprehensive understanding of emission dynamics.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 卫星衍生的叶绿素浓度数据与气象重分析数据的结合，提高了海洋异丁烯排放估算的准确性和可靠性，提供了高空间和时间分辨率的输入，允许对海洋环境中的生物和光化学排放进行详细计算。这种方法解决了数据可用性和排放机制不确定性等挑战，提供了对排放动态的更全面理解。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What are the potential challenges and limitations in using empirical linear relationships between chlorophyll concentration and isoprene emissions for estimating marine BVOC emissions, especially in regions with limited data coverage?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 在使用叶绿素浓度与异戊二烯排放之间的经验线性关系来估算海洋生物挥发性有机化合物（BVOC）排放时，尤其是在数据覆盖有限的地区，可能面临的挑战和限制包括：
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The potential challenges and limitations include regional constraints of the established relationships, which may not be applicable in all situations due to localized phytoplankton populations. Additionally, limited satellite data coverage, particularly in high latitudes during winter months, poses challenges in obtaining accurate chlorophyll concentration data, leading to uncertainties in emission estimates. These limitations can result in discrepancies between observed emissions and estimations.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 潜在的挑战和限制包括已建立关系的区域限制，这可能在不同情况下不适用，因为局部的浮游植物种群存在差异。此外，卫星数据覆盖的限制，特别是在冬季的高纬度地区，给获取准确的叶绿素浓度数据带来了挑战，从而导致排放估算的不确定性。这些限制可能导致观察到的排放与估算之间存在差异。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the uncertainties in the estimated emissions of marine isoprene, particularly in high latitude regions?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 影响高纬度地区海洋异戊烯排放估算不确定性的因素有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The uncertainties in estimated emissions of marine isoprene are influenced by data availability challenges and unclear emission mechanisms. Estimations for high latitudes are particularly compromised due to limited satellite data coverage during winter months. Additionally, previous estimations did not align with current observed vertical profiles of chlorophyll and isoprene concentrations in the subsurface ocean, further contributing to the uncertainties.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 海洋异戊烯估算中的不确定性受到数据可用性挑战和排放机制不明确的影响。高纬度地区的估算尤其受到限制，因为冬季的卫星数据覆盖有限。此外，以前的估算与当前观察到的亚表层海洋中叶绿素和异戊烯浓度的垂直分布不一致，进一步加剧了不确定性。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why is there a declining trend in annual total isoprene emissions across the tropical ocean from 2001 to 2020?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 为什么从2001年到2020年，热带海洋的年总异戊二烯排放量呈下降趋势？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The dataset indicates a declining trend in annual total isoprene emissions across the tropical ocean from 2001 to 2020, potentially due to variations in phytoplankton populations and changes in marine and meteorological factors over the years. The relationships established between emissions and these factors are regionally constrained, which might lead to such observed trends.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 数据集显示，从2001年到2020年，热带海洋的年总异戊二烯排放量呈下降趋势，这可能与浮游植物种群的变化以及多年海洋和气象因素的变化有关。排放量与这些因素之间建立的关系是区域性限制的，这可能导致观察到的趋势。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes discrepancies between observed marine isoprene emissions and estimations obtained using previous methods?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 导致观测到的海洋异丁烯排放与使用先前方法获得的估算值之间出现差异的原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Discrepancies between observed marine isoprene emissions and previous estimations arise from regionally constrained relationships between emissions and marine and meteorological factors, based on localized phytoplankton populations. These relationships may not be applicable in all situations, leading to differing results when compared to observed emissions.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 观察到的海洋异丁烯排放与之前的估算之间存在差异，这源于基于局部浮游植物种群的排放与海洋及气象因素之间的区域性约束关系。这些关系可能并不适用于所有情况，因此与观察到的排放相比，可能会导致不同的结果。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: How does the use of diverse data sources, such as MODIS and VIIRS, impact the reliability of marine isoprene emission datasets?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用多样化的数据源，如MODIS和VIIRS，如何影响海洋异丁烯排放数据集的可靠性？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The use of diverse data sources like MODIS and VIIRS enhances the reliability of marine isoprene emission datasets by incorporating multiple observational parameters, such as chlorophyll concentration and radiance data, which offer a comprehensive view of the factors influencing emissions across different regions and times.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 使用多样化的数据源，如MODIS和VIIRS，通过结合多种观测参数（如叶绿素浓度和辐射数据），增强了海洋异丁烯排放数据集的可靠性，这为不同地区和时间影响排放的因素提供了全面的视角。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What is the potential impact on marine isoprene emission estimations if satellite data coverage is limited in high-latitude regions during winter months?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 如果在冬季高纬度地区卫星数据覆盖有限，可能对海洋异戊烯排放估算产生什么影响？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Limited satellite data coverage in high-latitude regions during winter months may result in less accurate estimations of marine isoprene emissions due to the inability to capture seasonal variations and specific emission mechanisms that occur under those conditions, leading to increased uncertainties.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 在冬季，高纬度地区有限的卫星数据覆盖可能导致海洋异戊烯排放估算的不准确，因为无法捕捉到季节变化和在这些条件下发生的特定排放机制，从而增加了不确定性。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the primary goal of developing a dataset that includes both biological and photochemistry-generated marine isoprene emissions with high spatial resolution?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 开发一个包含生物和光化学生成的海洋异戊烯排放的高空间分辨率数据集的主要目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The primary goal is to provide a comprehensive, high-resolution dataset that can be used as input data for climate or atmospheric chemistry models, facilitating further studies into the impact of the air–sea system on marine secondary organic aerosol (SOA) formation and its climate effect.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 主要目标是提供一个全面的高分辨率数据集，作为气候或大气化学模型的输入数据，以促进对空气-海洋系统对海洋二次有机气溶胶（SOA）形成及其气候影响的进一步研究。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to incorporate both chlorophyll concentration data and meteorological reanalysis data in the creation of a marine isoprene emissions dataset?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在创建海洋异丁烯排放数据集时，结合叶绿素浓度数据和气象重分析数据是重要的原因是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Incorporating both chlorophyll concentration data and meteorological reanalysis data is important to accurately estimate marine isoprene emissions by accounting for the biological and physical processes that influence emissions, thus improving the reliability of the dataset for modeling and analysis.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 结合叶绿素浓度数据和气象重分析数据对于准确估算海洋异戊烯排放至关重要，因为这可以考虑影响排放的生物和物理过程，从而提高模型和分析的数据集的可靠性。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What drives the need to update the methods used for estimating marine isoprene emissions in datasets spanning multiple decades?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 驱动更新跨越多个十年的海洋异丁烯排放估算方法的需求的因素是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The need to update methods arises from challenges related to data availability, unclear emission mechanisms, and discrepancies between previous estimations and observed emissions, as well as advancements in understanding biological, physical, and chemical processes, allowing for more accurate and comprehensive emission assessments.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 更新方法的需求源于与数据可用性、排放机制不明确、先前估算与观察到的排放之间的差异，以及对生物、物理和化学过程理解的进步，这些都使得能够进行更准确和全面的排放评估。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How can one determine the dominant phytoplankton type using satellite data for the estimation of marine isoprene emissions?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 如何利用卫星数据确定主要的浮游植物类型，以估算海洋异丁烯排放？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The dominant phytoplankton type can be determined using monthly satellite-observed normalized water-leaving radiance at 410 nm, along with seawater chlorophyll concentration data. This approach allows for the classification of phytoplankton types, which is a critical factor in estimating the isoprene production rate.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 主导的浮游植物类型可以通过每月卫星观测的410 nm波长下的归一化水离开辐射率以及海水叶绿素浓度数据来确定。这种方法允许对浮游植物类型进行分类，而这对于估算异戊二烯的生产速率是一个关键因素。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What data collection methods enable the estimation of marine isoprene emissions with high spatial and temporal resolution?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些数据收集方法能够以高空间和时间分辨率估计海洋异丁烯排放？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The estimation of marine isoprene emissions with high spatial and temporal resolution is enabled by using satellite-derived ocean chlorophyll concentration data from the MODIS and the ERA5 hourly meteorological reanalysis. These methods allow for the calculation of both phytoplankton-generated biological emissions and photochemistry-generated emissions in the sea surface microlayer.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 利用来自MODIS的卫星衍生海洋叶绿素浓度数据和ERA5小时气象重分析，可以高空间和时间分辨率地估算海洋异戊烯排放。这些方法允许计算由浮游植物产生的生物排放和海表微层中的光化学产生的排放。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How do advancements in satellite technology contribute to the accurate estimation of chlorophyll concentration and its relation to isoprene emissions?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 卫星技术的进步如何有助于准确估计叶绿素浓度及其与异戊烯排放的关系？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Advancements in satellite technology contribute to accurate estimation by providing high-resolution data such as the MODIS Level 3 chlorophyll concentration and 490 nm radiative flux diffuse attenuation coefficient data, which are then averaged to fit the spatial resolution required for estimating isoprene emissions. These satellite datasets help in determining the distribution of phytoplankton types and their related emissions.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 卫星技术的进步通过提供高分辨率数据，如MODIS Level 3叶绿素浓度和490 nm辐射通量的散射衰减系数数据，促进了准确估算。这些卫星数据集有助于确定浮游植物类型的分布及其相关排放。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What conditions are necessary for overcoming challenges associated with estimating marine isoprene emissions in high latitude regions?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 克服高纬度地区海洋异戊烯排放估算相关挑战所需的条件是什么？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Overcoming challenges in high latitude regions requires improved data availability and satellite coverage during winter months, as well as aligning vertical distribution estimates of chlorophyll and isoprene concentrations with current observed profiles. This may involve enhancing satellite data resolution and coverage or developing new empirical relationships that account for regional constraints and variability.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 克服高纬度地区的挑战需要在冬季月份改善数据可用性和卫星覆盖率，以及将叶绿素和异戊二烯浓度的垂直分布估计与当前观察到的剖面对齐。这可能涉及提高卫星数据的分辨率和覆盖范围，或开发新的经验关系，以考虑区域限制和变异性。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might there be discrepancies between observed emissions and estimated emissions obtained using traditional data collection methods in marine isoprene studies?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在海洋异戊烯研究中，观察到的排放与使用传统数据收集方法获得的估计排放之间可能存在差异的原因是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Discrepancies between observed emissions and estimations might arise due to limitations in data availability, particularly in high latitudes during winter months, and unclear emission mechanisms. Additionally, previously used relationships between emissions and marine and meteorological factors, based on localized phytoplankton populations, may not be applicable in all regions, leading to estimation inaccuracies.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 观察到的排放与估算之间的差异可能源于数据可用性的限制，特别是在高纬度地区的冬季月份，以及排放机制的不明确。此外，基于局部浮游植物种群的海洋和气象因素之间的关系，可能在所有地区并不适用，从而导致估算不准确。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What challenges could arise from the use of satellite-derived chlorophyll concentration data when estimating marine isoprene emissions?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 使用卫星衍生的叶绿素浓度数据估算海洋异丁烯排放时可能会出现哪些挑战？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Challenges could include limited satellite data coverage in high latitudes during winter and potential misalignment between estimated vertical distributions of chlorophyll and observed vertical profiles in the subsurface ocean. These limitations can introduce uncertainties in the estimated emissions.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 挑战可能包括在冬季高纬度地区卫星数据覆盖有限，以及估计的叶绿素垂直分布与观测到的海洋次表层垂直剖面之间可能存在的不一致。这些限制可能会引入对估计排放量的不确定性。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might there be a need to update the methods used for calculating marine isoprene emissions in datasets?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 为什么可能需要更新用于计算海洋异戊烯排放的数据库中的方法？
Expectation.AnswerEn: There is a need to update methods due to advancements in understanding biological, physical, and chemical processes influencing emissions, and to incorporate the latest influencing factors and emission features. Previous methods might not fully account for the complex interactions and dynamics in the marine environment, leading to the need for more accurate and comprehensive data collection techniques.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 由于对影响排放的生物、物理和化学过程的理解不断进步，需要更新方法，并纳入最新的影响因素和排放特征。以往的方法可能未能充分考虑海洋环境中复杂的相互作用和动态，因此需要更准确和全面的数据收集技术。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How would you evaluate the effectiveness of using MODIS satellite data combined with ERA5 reanalysis for estimating marine isoprene emissions?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 如何评估将MODIS卫星数据与ERA5再分析结合使用来估算海洋异丁烯排放的有效性？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The effectiveness of using MODIS satellite data combined with ERA5 reanalysis is supported by the ability to provide high spatial resolution data necessary for estimating marine isoprene emissions. This approach leverages detailed chlorophyll concentration and meteorological data to improve the accuracy of emissions estimations, despite challenges related to data availability in high latitudes and alignment with observed vertical profiles.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 使用MODIS卫星数据结合ERA5再分析的有效性得到了支持，因为这种方法能够提供高空间分辨率的数据，必要用于估算海洋异丁烯排放。这种方法利用详细的叶绿素浓度和气象数据来提高排放估算的准确性，尽管在高纬度地区存在数据可用性和与观测垂直剖面对齐的挑战。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What are the perceived challenges in accurately estimating marine isoprene emissions, and how might these affect the reliability of current datasets?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 准确估计海洋异戊烯排放的感知挑战有哪些，这些挑战可能如何影响当前数据集的可靠性？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Perceived challenges include data availability, especially in high latitudes during winter months, and unclear emission mechanisms that lead to uncertainties. Discrepancies between observed emissions and estimations due to regionally constrained empirical relationships may affect the reliability of current datasets. These issues underline the importance of improving data coverage and refining emission estimation methods.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 感知的挑战包括数据可用性，尤其是在高纬度地区的冬季月份，以及导致不确定性的排放机制不明确。观察到的排放与估算之间的差异可能由于区域限制的经验关系而影响当前数据集的可靠性。这些问题强调了改善数据覆盖和精炼排放估算方法的重要性。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand how data availability affects the accuracy of marine isoprene emission estimates.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白数据可用性如何影响海洋异戊二烯排放估计的准确性。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Challenges related to data availability and unclear emission mechanisms lead to uncertainties in estimated emissions. Limited satellite data coverage, especially in high latitudes during winter months, contributes to these challenges.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 与数据可用性和不明确的排放机制相关的挑战导致了估计排放量的不确定性。卫星数据覆盖有限，尤其是在冬季的高纬度地区，这加剧了这些挑战。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't make sense of how different phytoplankton types influence marine isoprene emissions.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法理解不同类型的浮游植物如何影响海洋异丁烯的排放。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Phytoplankton-generated emission modules consider the classification of phytoplankton types, which are determined using satellite-observed normalized water-leaving radiance and seawater chlorophyll concentration. This classification influences the linear relationship used to estimate isoprene production rates.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 浮游植物生成的排放模块考虑了浮游植物类型的分类，这些分类是通过卫星观测的归一化水离开辐射和海水叶绿素浓度来确定的。这种分类影响了用于估算异戊二烯生产速率的线性关系。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please propose methods to address the uncertainties in the estimation of marine isoprene emissions, particularly in regions with limited satellite data coverage.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请提出方法来解决海洋异丁烯排放估算中的不确定性，特别是在卫星数据覆盖有限的地区。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: To address uncertainties in marine isoprene emission estimates, particularly in regions with limited satellite data coverage, one could enhance satellite data by integrating in situ observations and remote sensing data from additional sources during periods of limited coverage, such as winter months in high-latitude regions. Developing improved empirical models that consider localized variations in phytoplankton populations and atmospheric conditions could also help reduce discrepancies and uncertainties in emission estimates.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 为了应对海洋异戊烯排放估算中的不确定性，特别是在卫星数据覆盖有限的地区，可以通过在覆盖有限的时期（如高纬度地区的冬季）整合现场观测数据和来自其他来源的遥感数据来增强卫星数据。此外，开发考虑到浮游植物种群和大气条件局部变化的改进经验模型，也可以帮助减少排放估算中的差异和不确定性。
